snippet: A mosque in an Arab village in the Galilee was set on fire early Monday in what police said was an arson attack, and its walls were defaced with Hebrew graffiti.
lead_paragraph: A mosque in an Arab village in the Galilee was set on fire early Monday in what police said was an arson attack, and its walls were defaced with Hebrew graffiti.

headline.main: Mosque Set on Fire in Northern Israel
headline.print_headline: A Mosque Is Set on Fire In an Israeli Arab Village
headline.seo: Mosque Set on Fire in Israeli Arab Village, Tuba-Zangariya
